summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4712 for the improvement of 52nd Avenue Southwest from West Oregon Street to West Dakota Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54531, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
